tool.name: revertR2orientationInBam
tool.description: Revert the mapped orientation of R2 mates in a bam.

param.name: input
param.label: Select a sam or bam file.

tool.help: This tool is very useful when you have paired-end stranded RNA-seq. Using this tool prior to a bedtools genome coverage allow to have strand specific coverage using both mates. It uses samtools to convert input to sam format and then awk to modify the flag "reverse strand" for the second mate of pairs.
